Text: Got a very friendly letter from comcast telling me they've been sneaking around my yard and peeking in my windows to watch me download this movie, and they very politely said "CUT THAT SHIT OUT." SO, you know. Just so you know.

@mandypatinkin

You realize that can happen to you with almost every torrent of a well-known movie, right? Do yourself a favor and either use a proxy or peerblock, like any responsible pirate (oxymoron? i think not).
